snippet: For the third time, Google is being investigated in Britain over its secret Street View data collection. One thing investigators want to know: When they went to Google's offices in 2010 and saw a prepared sample of the data, why didn't it look...
abstract: For the third time, Google is being investigated in Britain over its secret Street View data collection. One thing investigators want to know: When they went to Google's offices in 2010 and saw a prepared sample of the data, why didn't it look anything like what they now know was collected?

headline.main: British Officials Try Again on Google Data Collection
